-"<b>Remote Access configuration information</b><hr>The Remote Access service "
-"requires that the TCP port 5900 and an HTTP port (5800 by default) be open "
-"in the firewall. You can configure this with YaST."

 #. Message box text: if VNC has been enabled the firewall should be checked
-msgid ""
-"<b>Remote Access configuration information</b><hr>The Remote Access service "
-"requires that the TCP port 5900 and an HTTP port (5800 by default) be open "

 #, fuzzy
-msgid ""
-"<b>Remote Access configuration information</b><hr>The Remote Access service "
-"requires that the TCP port 5900 and an HTTP port (5800 by default) be open "
-"in the firewall. You can configure this with YaST."
-msgstr ""
-"<b>Ulwazi Lobumbeko lwe-VNC</b><hr>Inkonzo ye-VNC ifuna ukuba "
-"isiqhagamshelanisi se-TCP 5900 nesiqhagamshelanisi se-HTTP (5800 ehlala "
-"ikhona) sivuleke kwi-firewall.  Unako ukwenza ubumbeko neYaST."
+msgid "<b>Remote Access configuration information</b><hr>The Remote Access service requires that the TCP port 5900 and an HTTP port (5800 by default) be open in the firewall. You can configure this with YaST."
